text.4_Daf, 9_Line: “Master of the Universe, has Israel, who accepted the Torah, observed it?
text.5_Daf, 13_Line: Rather, they will be self-made converts, and they will place tefillin on their heads and on their arms, fringes on their garments, and a mezuzah on their doorposts,
text.3_Daf, 12_Line: And from where do we know that the most important ones come in [for judgment] first?
text.3_Daf, 79_Line: Thereupon God will say to them:
